column4: Is there a way to figure out what the smallest base installation would be for my machine to run jaunty.  On an AAO.  Want to build from the smallest install ground up for space conservations.
you can start with the minimal iso (9MB) and build from there
what hd size on the netbook
SSD is 16, was hoping to fit a triple/boot.  My next quest was going to be to learn how to format the SSD so I could get the optimal bootings of OS X, XP, and Jaunty
